items.message:
The weather system has moved over the North Sea and the period of high risk has passed.

There is no longer a threat of flooding, though standing water and debris may still remain. Be aware there still may be some areas where flood water is present until it can naturally drain away.

River levels are expected to remain high throughout the day. 

We will continue to clear trash screens and monitor the forecast and re-issue any alerts/warnings if necessary.

floodArea.county: County Durham, Darlington, North Yorkshire, Westmorland and Furness
